name: Baracchi Smeriglio Sangiovese
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (baracchiwinery.com) Tuscan Sangiovese from Baracchi estate in Cortona. DOC quality - family winery with rich tradition!

üç∑ STYLE: Medium-bodied | Bright red cherry, herbs & earthy notes | Fresh acidity, smooth tannins | Classic Tuscan character.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Tomato-based pasta, pizza, grilled meats, charcuterie.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Great introduction to Sangiovese at excellent value. Versatile everyday Italian red perfect for sharing!

name: G.D. Vajra Nebbiolo Clare J.C.
serverNotes:
üåø ABOUT: (gdvajra.com) Piedmont Nebbiolo from renowned biodynamic producer G.D. Vajra. DOC quality - sustainable winemaking excellence!

üç∑ STYLE: Light to medium-bodied | Rose petals, red cherry & herbs | More approachable than Barolo | Early-drinking | Classic Piedmont elegance.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Pasta, lighter meats, mushrooms, truffle dishes.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Great introduction to Nebbiolo grape from a quality producer. Excellent value for this pedigree!

name: Valentina Montepulciano d'Abruzzo
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (montepulciano.it) Montepulciano d'Abruzzo from central Italy. DOC quality - classic Abruzzo red from the Adriatic coast!

üç∑ STYLE: Medium-bodied | Dark cherry, plum & soft tannins | Easy-drinking, versatile | Crowd-pleasing Italian style.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Pizza, pasta, red sauce dishes, grilled meats.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Great value everyday wine. Perfect house bottle for casual Italian dining!

name: Ascheri Langhe Barbera
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (ascherivini.it) Piedmont Barbera from Ascheri in Langhe. DOC quality - traditional Piedmont winemaking!

üç∑ STYLE: Medium-bodied | Bright cherry, red fruit & high acidity | Food-friendly, versatile | Classic Piedmont character.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Tomato-based pasta, charcuterie, pizza, Italian cuisine.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Perfect entry-level Italian red. Great value bottle from a quality Langhe producer!

name: G.D. Vajra Dolcetto D'Alba
serverNotes:
üåø ABOUT: (gdvajra.com) Dolcetto d'Alba from renowned biodynamic producer G.D. Vajra. DOC quality - sustainable Piedmont excellence!

üç∑ STYLE: Light to medium-bodied | Dark cherry, almond & soft tannins | Easy-drinking, slightly fruity | Approachable Piedmont style.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Antipasto, lighter pastas, roasted chicken, everyday meals.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Perfect everyday Italian wine from a top producer. Quality you can trust!

name: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (castellobanfi.com) Rosso di Montalcino from Castello Banfi. DOC quality - 'Baby Brunello' from famous Brunello producer!

üç∑ STYLE: Medium-bodied Sangiovese | Cherry, herbs & soft tannins | Younger, more approachable | Introduction to Montalcino style.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Red sauce pasta, grilled meats, pizza, Italian classics.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Great introduction to Montalcino wines at accessible price. Same terroir as Brunello, earlier drinking!

name: "Rosina" Barbera D'Asti by Garretto
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (garettovini.it) Classic Piedmont Barbera from Garretto. DOCG quality - Barbera d'Asti at its finest! Also available by the glass.

üç∑ STYLE: Medium-bodied | Bright cherry, plum & vibrant acidity | Food-friendly versatility | Traditional Piedmont character.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Tomato dishes, charcuterie, pasta, Italian cuisine.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Available by the glass too - great for larger parties wanting to share. The high acidity cuts through rich sauces beautifully!

name: San Felice Chianti Classico
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (agricolasanfelice.it) Classic Tuscan Chianti Classico from San Felice. DOCG quality - quintessential Tuscan table wine! Also available by the glass.

üç∑ STYLE: Medium-bodied Sangiovese | Red cherry, dried herbs & hints of leather | Balanced acidity, soft tannins | Traditional Tuscany.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Red sauce pasta, pizza, grilled meats, all Italian dishes.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Perfect house bottle for Italian dinner. This is what Italians drink with dinner every night. Also available by the glass!

name: Ca' Del Baio Barbaresco Autinbej
serverNotes:
üëë ABOUT: (cadelbaio.com) Elegant Barbaresco from Ca' Del Baio in Piedmont. DOCG quality - Queen of Piedmont wines!

üç∑ STYLE: Full-bodied Nebbiolo | Rose petals, red cherry & tar | Softer tannins than Barolo | Earlier drinking | Sophisticated elegance.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Duck, truffle dishes, aged cheese, risotto.

üçæ DECANTING: Recommended 1 hour before serving to soften tannins and open up complex aromatics.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Premium Piedmont experience at accessible price. Perfect for special occasions!

name: Benanti Etna Rosso
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (vinibenanti.it) Unique Sicilian red from volcanic Mt. Etna slopes by Benanti. DOC quality - Nerello Mascalese grape. Trendy & conversation starter!

üç∑ STYLE: Light-bodied | Red cherry, herbs, mineral & smoke | High acidity | Volcanic terroir | Food-friendly Italian wine.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Grilled vegetables, fish, lighter meats, seafood.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Trendy wine from one of Sicily's most exciting regions. Perfect for wine enthusiasts seeking something unique!

name: Ascheri Barolo
serverNotes:
üëë ABOUT: (ascherivini.it) King of Italian wines from Ascheri! DOCG Barolo from Nebbiolo grape. Also available by the glass - rare treat!

üç∑ STYLE: Full-bodied | Complex with rose, tar, dark cherry & truffle | Firm tannins, elegant | Traditional Piedmont style | Age-worthy.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Braised meats, truffle pasta, aged cheese, osso buco.

üçæ DECANTING: Recommended 1-2 hours before serving to soften tannins and open up complex aromatics.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Perfect for special occasions or serious wine lovers. Available by the glass too!

name: Bussola Valpolicella Ripasso
serverNotes:
üçá ABOUT: (bussola.eu) Valpolicella Ripasso from Bussola in Veneto. DOCG quality - made with special 'ripasso' method! Also available by the glass.

üç∑ STYLE: Medium to full-bodied | Rich cherry, raisin & spice | Re-fermented on Amarone grape skins | Smooth, velvety texture | Step up from regular Valpolicella.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Osso buco, roasted meats, risotto, braised dishes.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: The ripasso method adds richness and complexity. Think of it as 'baby Amarone'! Available by the glass too.

name: Antinori Chianti Classico Riserva
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (antinori.it) Premium Chianti from legendary 600-year-old Antinori family. DOCG Riserva quality - prestigious Italian wine dynasty!

üç∑ STYLE: Full-bodied Sangiovese | Dark cherry, spice & oak | Richer, more complex than regular Chianti | Aged longer, fuller body | Traditional Tuscan excellence.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Bistecca, wild boar, mature cheese, hearty Tuscan dishes.

üçæ DECANTING: Recommended 30-60 minutes before serving to soften tannins and open up complex aromatics.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Step-up Tuscan choice from one of Italy's most prestigious wine families. Perfect for special occasions!

name: Carpineto Vino Nobile di Montepulciano Riserva
pronunciation: car-pee-NAY-toh VEE-noh NOH-bee-lay dee mon-tay-pull-chee-AH-noh ree-SEHR-vah
serverNotes: Elegant Tuscan Sangiovese from Montepulciano area. Cherry, plum, leather, and spice. Riserva = aged longer, more complex. Rated 91 pts. Pairs with roasted meats, game, mature cheese. Sophisticated alternative to Chianti or Brunello. DECANT 30-60 minutes to soften tannins and enhance complexity.

name: San Marzano "62 Anniversario", Primitivo
serverNotes: Bold Primitivo (Italian Zinfandel) from southern Italy. Rated 92 pts. Full-bodied with ripe dark fruit, spice, chocolate. Rich, warm, powerful. Great with BBQ, grilled meats, hearty pasta, aged cheese. Excellent value for quality.

name: Caparzo Brunello di Montalcino
serverNotes: Classic Brunello from historic producer. 100% Sangiovese with dark cherry, leather, tobacco, herbs. Full-bodied, structured tannins, age-worthy. Highly rated (95 pts). Prestigious Tuscan wine. Pairs with bistecca, lamb, aged cheese. Special occasion choice. DECANT 1-2 hours before serving to open up concentrated flavors and soften structured tannins.

name: G.D. Vajra Barolo Albe
serverNotes: Premium Barolo from renowned biodynamic producer. Classic Nebbiolo with rose, tar, red fruit, complexity. Elegant, balanced, traditional style. From quality-focused family winery. Pairs with braised beef, truffle dishes, aged cheese. Serious wine for connoisseurs. DECANT 1-2 hours before serving to soften firm tannins and release complex aromatics (rose, tar, truffle).

name: Campogiovanni Brunello di Montalcino
serverNotes: Excellent Brunello from San Felice's Campogiovanni estate. Rated 93 pts. 100% Sangiovese with dark cherry, leather, tobacco, spice. Full-bodied, structured, age-worthy. Classic Montalcino style from historic producer. Pairs with Florentine steak, lamb, wild boar, aged Pecorino. Special occasion wine. DECANT 1-2 hours before serving to open up concentrated flavors and soften structured tannins.

name: Altesino Brunello di Montalcino
serverNotes: Premium Brunello from iconic producer. Rich, concentrated Sangiovese with dark fruit, spice, earth. Full-bodied, powerful, age-worthy. One of Montalcino's finest. Pairs with bistecca Fiorentina, wild boar, truffles. Investment-quality Italian wine. DECANT 1-2 hours before serving to open up concentrated flavors and soften structured tannins.

name: Gagliardo Barolo
serverNotes: Premium Barolo with complex aromatics - rose petals, tar, dark cherry, licorice. Full-bodied, firm tannins, long aging potential. From prestigious Piedmont estate. Perfect for special celebrations or serious wine collectors. Pairs with braised meats, truffle dishes, aged Parm esano. DECANT 1-2 hours before serving to soften firm tannins and release complex aromatics (rose, tar, truffle).

name: Livio Sassetti Brunello di Montalcino
serverNotes: Outstanding Brunello rated 96 pts. Rich, concentrated Sangiovese with exceptional depth. Dark cherry, leather, tobacco, herbs, minerals. Full-bodied, powerful structure, cellar-worthy. From small artisan producer. Ultimate Tuscan wine for collectors. Pairs with Florentine steak, wild boar, aged cheese. DECANT 1-2 hours before serving to open up concentrated flavors and soften structured tannins.

name: Tommasi Amarone
serverNotes: Legendary dried-grape wine from Veneto. Full-bodied, rich, velvety with raisin, chocolate, spice. Made from partially dried grapes, concentrated flavors. High alcohol, intense. Pairs with braised meats, game, strong cheese, or chocolate dessert. Unique Italian wine experience. DECANT 1-2 hours to open up intense, concentrated dried-grape flavors and velvety texture.

name: Scavino "Bricco Ambrogio" Barolo
serverNotes: Exceptional single-vineyard Barolo rated 97 pts. From renowned Paolo Scavino estate. Complex Nebbiolo with rose, tar, dark cherry, truffle, spice. Full-bodied, powerful tannins, extraordinary depth. One of Barolo's finest crus. For serious collectors and special celebrations. Pairs with white truffle, braised beef, aged Parmigiano. World-class Piedmont wine. DECANT 1-2 hours before serving to soften firm tannins and release complex aromatics (rose, tar, truffle).

name: Gaja Pieve Santa Restituta Brunello di Montalcino
serverNotes: Legendary Gaja's Brunello estate wine. Elegant, refined Sangiovese with red fruit, spice, mineral. Rated 94 pts. From Italy's most famous winemaker. Prestigious choice for collectors. Pairs with Florentine steak, game, truffle dishes. Icon wine. DECANT 1-2 hours before serving to open up concentrated flavors and soften structured tannins.

name: Petrolo "B√≤ggina C" Riserva
serverNotes: Premium Tuscan blend from boutique producer. 100% Sangiovese, modern style with concentrated fruit, oak, structure. Rated 95 pts. Cellar-worthy, powerful. For serious collectors. Pairs with prime cuts, braised meats, aged cheese. World-class Tuscan wine.

name: Petrolo Galatrona
serverNotes: Exceptional 100% Merlot from Tuscany. Nearly perfect 98 pts rating. Rich, velvety, concentrated black fruit, chocolate, spice. World-class Super Tuscan. Competes with Bordeaux's best. For collectors and special celebrations. Pairs with prime beef, lamb, game. Remarkable wine.

name: Gagliardo "Fossati" Barolo
serverNotes: Single-vineyard Barolo from premium Fossati cru. Complex Nebbiolo with rose, tar, cherry, truffle. Rated 93 pts. Elegant, age-worthy, traditional style. From family estate. Ultimate Piedmont expression. Pairs with white truffle, braised beef, aged Parmigiano. Collector's choice. DECANT 1-2 hours before serving to soften firm tannins and release complex aromatics (rose, tar, truffle).

name: Bertani Amarone Classico
serverNotes: Legendary Amarone from historic Veneto producer (since 1857). Full-bodied dried-grape wine with raisin, chocolate, spice, power. Traditional style, age-worthy. Icon Italian wine. Pairs with rich meats, game, blue cheese, or chocolate. Ultimate expression of Amarone. DECANT 1-2 hours to open up intense, concentrated dried-grape flavors and velvety texture.

name: Giodo, Brunello di Montalcino
serverNotes: Near-perfect Brunello rated 99 pts! Exceptional Sangiovese with extraordinary depth, complexity. Dark cherry, leather, tobacco, minerals. Full-bodied, powerful, cellar-worthy for decades. From small artisan producer. Ultimate Tuscan wine. For serious collectors only. Pairs with Florentine steak, truffles. DECANT 1-2 hours before serving to open up concentrated flavors and soften structured tannins.

name: Gaja "Sugarille" Pieve Santa Restituta Brunello di Montalcino
pronunciation: GAH-yah soo-gah-REEL-yay pee-AY-vay SAN-tah res-tee-TOO-tah broo-NELL-oh
serverNotes: Gaja's single-vineyard Brunello. Exceptional quality rated 96 pts. Complex, elegant Sangiovese with remarkable depth. From Italy's most legendary producer. Investment-grade wine. Pairs with finest cuts, white truffle, aged Parmigiano. Ultimate Italian wine experience. DECANT 1-2 hours before serving to open up concentrated flavors and soften structured tannins.

name: Gaja Sperss Barolo
serverNotes: Gaja's pinnacle Barolo, rated 97 pts. One of Italy's greatest wines. Extraordinary Nebbiolo with phenomenal complexity, depth, elegance. Single-vineyard masterpiece. Cellar for decades. For ultimate collectors and special once-in-lifetime celebrations. Pairs with white truffle, finest cuts. Legendary wine. DECANT 1-2 hours before serving to soften firm tannins and release complex aromatics (rose, tar, truffle).
